|brand = Philips |model = PH1621 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/14/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Philips PH1621 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series -->
|usb_ver = 2.0 |conn = Male A |size_class = mini
|vendor_id = 05e3 |device_id = 0608 |vendor_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number -->
|controller_num = <!-- Number of controllers --> |chip1 = Genesys Logic;GL850A; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|pwr_optional = true |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|ports = 4 |1394ports = |tt = single |power_led = none |port_led = |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none -->
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Action Star |manuf_model = UH-214X |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |estreldate = 2005 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 026616012862 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B000JJZYS0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "UH-214X-ASGLA-051115" is silkscreened on the board. :The '''Genesys Logic''' hub IC is marked with "GL850A", "MS2DC03G06", and "732A84768".
The power adapter included with the hub is a '''DVE''' DSA-15P-05 US 050125 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 5V 2.5A).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
